title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5005.1 - Subscription program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5005.1 - Subscription program

State Regulations
(a) Subscription play. The commission may establish a
commission-administered subscription program for any commission game or games. The subscription program may permit a subscriber to play the same game
character selections for a period of consecutive drawings over a stated period
in such games as the commission may decide. (b) Application or renewal
forms. Entry into a subscription program will require the completion
and submission of an electronic subscription application form or an electronic
subscription renewal form. The subscriber may provide the subscriber's social
security number or taxpayer identification number on the respective application
form so that prizes requiring tax reporting or withholding may be sent or
credited to the winning subscriber. (c) Social security number or
taxpayer identification number. By providing the social security
number or taxpayer identification number, the subscriber authorizes the
commission to retain and use the number for the purpose of tax reporting and
any other lawful purpose of the commission. Notes

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
